file.title: Background image layout

p.text: This is a style of the object background (Tile, Stretch).

p.textAll: All available Background image layouts are described in: Quick fill words -> Background image layout.

sample.sampletitle: Variants of how Background image layout can be set:
sample.samplecode: Window1.Button1.Background image layout = "Zoom" Window1.Button1.Background image layout = Stretch Window1.Button1.Background image layout = Window1.Button2.Background image layout Window1.Button1.Background image layout = Window1.Text1.Text
